author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menu for `CMSSW_12_4_HLT_X`.

**This PR is NOT a backport**.

This version of the GRun Frozen HLT menu corresponds to to the **"V1.5"** menu for the 2022 pp data-taking period.  The older version **"V1.4"** is removed. All TSG integration tests are updated accordingly.
This update includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:

  - [CMSHLT-2516](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2516): Enable backup TAU triggers online
  - [CMSHLT-2541](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2541): Disable `HLT_HT200_L1SingleLLPJet_DisplacedDijet30_Inclusive1PtrkShortSig5_v2`
- [CMSHLT-2542](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2542): Unprescale `HLT_EphemeralZeroBias_v3` in 2p0E34+ZeroBias+HLTPhysics
- [CMSHLT-2546](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2546): Increase PS of `HLT_DoubleMu4_3_Jpsi_v2`
- [CMSHLT-2547](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2547): Increase PS of `HLT_HT300_Beamspot`
- [CMSHLT-2548](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2548): Unprescale `HLT_Mu50_L1SingleMuShower_v1`
- [CMSHLT-2550](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2550): Default PS column of HLT menu (2022 V1.4 and V1.5)
- [CMSHLT-2553](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2553): New Di-electron triggers with a tighter `TrkValidHits` cut for the R(X)-type analysis in Run-3
- [CMSHLT-2570](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2570): Disable backup TAU triggers online

#### PR validation:

TSG integration tests 

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, not to be forward-ported.
title: [`12.4_HLT_X`] HLT configurations for 2022 MC: from menu 2022 V1.4 to menu 2022 V1.5
